body_html:
Hi @aselle :
I use to install tensorflow-0.11.0rc0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl and run tensorflow normally for one month. This error suddenly occured. Now, I have tried to reinstall the tensorflow, but when I run ./configure, I got this error:

ERROR: com.google.devtools.build.lib.packages.BuildFileContainsErrorsException: error loading package '': Encountered error while reading extension file 'cuda/build_defs.bzl': no such package '@local_config_cuda//cuda': Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/home/common/tools/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 517
        _create_cuda_repository(repository_ctx)
    File "/home/common/tools/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 432, in _create_cuda_repository
        _cuda_toolkit_path(repository_ctx, cuda_version)
    File "/home/common/tools/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 148, in _cuda_toolkit_path
        str(repository_ctx.path(cuda_toolkit...)
    File "/home/common/tools/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 148, in str
        repository_ctx.path(cuda_toolkit_path).realpath
Object of type 'path' has no field "realpath".

I am not sure what happened exactly?

body:
Hi @aselle :
I use to install tensorflow-0.11.0rc0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl and run tensorflow normally for one month. This error suddenly occured. Now, I have tried to reinstall the tensorflow, but when I run ./configure, I got this error:

```
ERROR: com.google.devtools.build.lib.packages.BuildFileContainsErrorsException: error loading package '': Encountered error while reading extension file 'cuda/build_defs.bzl': no such package '@local_config_cuda//cuda': Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/home/common/tools/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 517
        _create_cuda_repository(repository_ctx)
    File "/home/common/tools/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 432, in _create_cuda_repository
        _cuda_toolkit_path(repository_ctx, cuda_version)
    File "/home/common/tools/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 148, in _cuda_toolkit_path
        str(repository_ctx.path(cuda_toolkit...)
    File "/home/common/tools/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl", line 148, in str
        repository_ctx.path(cuda_toolkit_path).realpath
Object of type 'path' has no field "realpath".
```

I am not sure what happened exactly?
